```{r}
library("readxl")
x <- read_excel("./kcmillersean-billboard-hot-100-1958-2017/original/Hot 100 Audio Features.xlsx")
```

```{r}
x
```

```{r}
dim(x)
```

```{r}
apply(x[x$spotify_track_explicit == TRUE,9:22],2,mean,na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
apply(x[x$spotify_track_explicit == FALSE,9:22],2,mean,na.rm = TRUE)
```
```{r}
sum(x$spotify_track_explicit == FALSE,na.rm = TRUE)
sum(x$spotify_track_explicit == TRUE,na.rm = TRUE)
```
```{r}
hist(x$loudness[x$spotify_track_explicit == FALSE],freq = FALSE,border = "green",ylim = c(0,0.2))
hist(x$loudness[x$spotify_track_explicit == TRUE],freq = FALSE,add  = TRUE,border = "red",ylim = c(0,0.2))


```

```{r}
hist(x$speechiness[x$spotify_track_explicit == FALSE],freq = FALSE,border = "green")
hist(x$speechiness[x$spotify_track_explicit == TRUE],freq = FALSE,add  = TRUE,border = "red")
```
```{r}
hist(x$danceability[x$spotify_track_explicit == FALSE],freq = FALSE,border = "green")
hist(x$danceability[x$spotify_track_explicit == TRUE],freq = FALSE,add  = TRUE,border = "red")
```
```{r}
hist(x$spotify_track_popularity[x$spotify_track_explicit == FALSE],freq = FALSE,border = "green",ylim = c(0,0.05))
hist(x$spotify_track_popularity[x$spotify_track_explicit == TRUE],freq = FALSE,add  = TRUE,border = "red",ylim = c(0,0.05))
```
